title: Gold Steadies After Faltering Near End of Best Year Since 1979
description: Gold steadied after an end-of-year dip, but is still on track for its best annual performance since 1979, along with silver.
content: Gold steadied after an end-of-year dip, but is still on track for its best annual performance since 1979, along with silver.
